name: S-Boucle Pouffe - Mustard
description: Elevate your living space with the luxurious comfort of the S-Boucle Pouffe. This stylish and versatile pouffe is designed to blend seamlessly into any home décor, adding a touch of contemporary elegance. Made with ultra-soft boucle fabric, it invites you to relax, whether you use it as extra seating, a footrest, or a chic accent piece. Its rounded silhouette and textured finish bring warmth and character to any room, making it a perfect addition to your living room, bedroom, or reading nook. Key Features Luxurious Boucle Fabric Soft, textured boucle fabric offers both style and comfort, perfect for creating a cozy ambiance. Versatile Design Can be used as a seat, footrest, or accent piece, making it a functional and stylish addition to any room. Durable Construction Built with high-quality materials to ensure long-lasting durability and support. Compact &amp Lightweight Its lightweight design makes it easy to move around, while the compact size fits effortlessly into smaller spaces.

name: Mirage Brown Cane Folding Table
description: The Mirage Brown Cane Folding Table effortlessly blends style and functionality, making it a perfect addition to any home. Crafted with a premium pinewood finish and durable ply, this folding table offers the warmth of natural wood along with the practicality of easy storage. Its elegant design and intricate cane detailing bring a touch of rustic charm to your living room, dining area, or outdoor spaces. Whether youre hosting guests, enjoying a quiet coffee, or in need of extra surface space, the Mirage folding table is your go-to solution for versatile living. Key Features Premium Pinewood Finish  Adds a warm, natural aesthetic to your décor, blending seamlessly with a variety of interior styles. Durable Ply Construction  Built to last, the sturdy ply material ensures long-lasting use while maintaining lightweight portability. Elegant Detailing  The intricate pattern on the tables surface elevates its design, making it a standout piece for both modern and traditional spaces. Foldable &amp Space-Saving Design  Effortlessly folds away for easy storage, making it an ideal choice for small spaces or multipurpose rooms.

name: Noir Black Cane Handle Trolley
description: Discover the perfect blend of sophistication and functionality with the Noir Black Cane Handle Trolley. Designed for modern living, this stunning bar trolley is crafted from premium pine wood and durable Century Ply, offering both style and practicality. Whether youre hosting guests or looking for a chic storage solution, this trolley delivers timeless appeal with a sleek black finish and distinctive cane handles. Key Features Premium Craftsmanship Constructed from solid pine wood and Century Ply, ensuring long-lasting durability and an elegant aesthetic that complements any home décor. Sleek &amp Stylish Design The matte black finish and unique cane handles add a touch of modern luxury, making it a versatile piece for living rooms, dining areas, or home bars. Ample Storage Space Features multiple shelves and a sturdy top for displaying bottles, glassware, or decorative items, keeping everything organized and within reach. Smooth Mobility Equipped with smooth-rolling, lockable wheels, allowing for easy movement and stability, whether youre entertaining or rearranging your space.

name: Genoa Coffee Table - Set of 2 (Only For Mumbai)
description: Elevate your living space with the Genoa Coffee Table, a stunning piece that seamlessly combines modern design with timeless materials. Crafted with a sturdy metal base and a luxurious marble top, this coffee table exudes sophistication while offering practical functionality. Key Features Premium Materials Features a durable metal frame and a sleek marble surface, ensuring long-lasting quality and style. Contemporary Design Minimalistic yet striking, the Genoa Coffee Table complements both modern and traditional interiors. Spacious Tabletop The generous marble top provides ample space for decor, drinks, or everyday essentials. Low-Maintenance Finish The marble surface is easy to clean, making it perfect for busy households.

name: Lumon Table Lamp
description: Elevate your table décor with the Lumon Table Lamp, a blend of modern functionality and luxe design. Offering convenient lighting with 3 lighting modes, this versatile lamp adapts to your every mood and space. With tap control for on/off and mode changes, plus USB charging that lasts upto 4-6 hours, it combines style and practicality in one high-quality piece. Perfect for bedrooms, study corners, or living spaces, the Lumon Lamp is where elegance meets everyday ease. Key Features 3 Lighting Modes Switch easily between warm, cool, and neutral light for the perfect ambiance. Tap Control Simply tap to power on/off or adjust between lighting modes. USB Charging Convenient charging option for effortless use anywhere. Luxe Design A stylish statement piece that enhances any home décor or table décor. Versatile &amp Durable High-quality build suitable for bedrooms, offices, or living rooms.

name: Serpent White Candle - Set Of 2
description: Unwind and create an atmosphere of pure tranquility with our exquisite diffuser set. Immerse yourself in a sensory journey as our diffuser infuses your space with delightful candles, soothing your mind and rejuvenating your spirit.

name: Pinions Wall Clock
description: Elevate your home decor with the Pinions Wall Clock, a stunning blend of modern minimalism and vintage elegance. Crafted from durable black metal, this timeless piece features bold brass Roman numerals and matching watch hands, adding a luxurious touch to any room. Its sleek design and precise detailing make it both a functional timepiece and a striking decor element. Perfect for living rooms, offices, or entryways, this wall clock effortlessly complements contemporary and classic interiors alike. Key Features Premium Material Made from sturdy black metal for durability and a refined look. Elegant Brass Accents Features brass Roman numerals and hands for a sophisticated, vintage-inspired aesthetic. Timeless Design Combines modern simplicity with classic charm, ideal for various decor styles. Easy Installation Lightweight and simple to mount, perfect for any wall space.

name: Soyut Candle Stand - Large
description: Add a timeless glow to your home with this elegant crystal and gold candle holder, where modern minimalism meets traditional opulence. Crafted from high-quality crystal glass and finished in a luxe gold tone, this candle holder is designed to elevate any space  from festive dining tables to quiet bedside corners. Its sculptural silhouette and reflective finish make it the perfect centerpiece for both classic interiors and contemporary homes. Whether youre setting the mood for a dinner party or creating a warm ambiance in your living room, this candle holder is a sophisticated statement piece. Perfect for luxury home décor, festive decorations, or as a thoughtful gift for housewarmings and weddings. Key Features Premium Crystal Glass  Crafted from clear, high-grade crystal that adds sparkle and elegance to any setting. Luxe Gold Finish  The rich gold-toned base enhances the design with a touch of royal charm. Modern-Classic Design  A seamless blend of traditional detailing and modern simplicity for versatile styling. Multipurpose Décor  Ideal for center tables, mantels, consoles, or as part of your festive décor. Gift-Ready Accent Piece  Makes a charming and classy gift for weddings, anniversaries, and housewarmings.

name: Bauhaus Handcrafted Carpet - 4x6 Feet
description: Elevate your living space with the Bauhaus Handcrafted Carpet, a stunning fusion of artistry and functionality. Made from premium woven fabric, this elegant carpet features a dark beige and ivory color palette with an abstract symmetrical pattern, making it a versatile addition to both modern and classic interiors. Meticulously designed for style and durability, it adds a sophisticated charm to your home decor. Key Features Handcrafted Excellence  Expertly woven for superior craftsmanship and durability. Timeless Design  Abstract symmetrical patterns in neutral tones complement any décor style. Premium Material  Made with high-quality woven fabric for a soft and luxurious feel. Perfect Dimensions  Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, or study areas, adding warmth and character.

name: Faux Fur Floor Runner - Pink
description: Elevate your homes elegance with our Faux Fur Floor Runner. Luxuriously soft and irresistibly chic, this runner adds a touch of opulence to your space. Perfect for hallways or as a cozy accent in any room, its the ultimate statement piece for style and comfort.

name: Side Coffee Table
description: Ready to elevate your living room game Introducing Arhat Coffee Tablemore than just a piece of furniture, its a conversation starter. This sleek table isnt just about holding your mugs its a hub for one-on-one conversation, a place to pamper yourself with scented candles and a resting spot for your latest read. This tabletop has a railing to prevent objects from falling. Its unique and stylish design isnt just eye-candy but also practical. Upgrade your space with the Arhats Coffee Table, where style meets substance. Its time to turn your living room into a hotspot for relaxation and good vibes. Get yours today and start making your coffee breaks legendary

name: Manhattan Coffee Table - Black
description: Upgrade your living space with the Manhattan Coffee Table - Black, a statement piece that blends luxury with functionality. Designed for modern living rooms, this versatile center table enhances any home decor with its striking black finish. Crafted from premium MDF with a coated surface, it offers durability while adding a sophisticated touch to your space. Whether youre styling a living room, lounge, or office, this coffee table is perfect for displaying décor, serving guests, or organizing essentials. Key Features Luxurious Design  A sleek black surface creates a stunning focal point for any room. Premium Quality  Made with sustainable approach using recycled marble slurry with liquid metal coating for enhanced durability and a refined look Versatile &amp Functional  Ideal as a center table for your living room decor, lounge area, or office space. Spacious Surface  Provides ample space for coffee table books, decor accents, and daily essentials. Perfect for Modern Homes  Complements contemporary, minimalist, and classic interiors effortlessly.

name: Seoul Oblong Coffee Table
description: A statement in simplicity and elegance, the Seoul Oblong Coffee Table blends modern minimalism with functional design. Its elongated oval silhouette and low profile create a grounded, calming presence in your indoor living space. Crafted with clean lines and smooth contours, this coffee table effortlessly balances contemporary appeal with a timeless touch. Whether placed in a minimalist loft or a cozy lounge, it invites calm conversation and curated style. Key Features Elegant Oblong Shape Smooth, rounded edges and an elongated oval form add a soft, sculptural touch to any setting. Modern Aesthetic Inspired by Seouls modern interiorsclean, understated, and calming. Premium Materials Constructed from high-quality wood/MDF with a matte or natural finish (customizable based on your product). Low-Profile Design Ideal for modern and minimalist living rooms pairs well with floor seating or sleek sofas. Versatile Use Perfect as a coffee table, centerpiece, or display surface for books and décor.

name: Odessa Nesting Tables - Black (Set of 2)

The nesting feature allows for space-saving convenience, letting you arrange them together or separately to suit your needs. Ivory Elegance  A timeless neutral shade that complements any modern living room. Multi-Purpose Design  Ideal as a coffee table, center table, or side table for home decor. Space-Saving Solution  Lightweight and easy to move around when not in use.
